Text-to-SQL is an important task, models of which are mainly adopted by administrative industries, where unfair decisions may lead to catastrophic consequences. translated_title: 揭示和分类Text-to-SQL中的社会偏见
translated_abstract: 本文对Text-to-SQL模型中的社会偏见进行了探讨和分类，揭示了传统的数据集可能在现实应用中掩盖了模型的社会偏见。同时，本文提出了一种简单而有效的数据增强方法，以弥补偏见数据，并提高了模型在偏见数据上的性能。
tldr: 本文揭示和分类了Text-to-SQL模型中的社会偏见，并提出了一种数据增强方法来弥补偏见数据的影响，提高模型的性能。
en_tdlr: This paper uncovers and categorizes social biases in Text-to-SQL models and proposes a data augmentation method to counteract biased data and improve model performance, which is a step towards developing fairer Text-to-SQL models that account for the complexity of social biases in society.
